issues.detailed_explaination: The actions 'actions/checkout' and 'actions/setup-java' are using version v4, which is not a stable release. It's recommended to use a specific version or a stable release tag to avoid unexpected changes.
issues.suggestion: Change the action versions to a stable release, such as 'actions/checkout@v2' and 'actions/setup-java@v2'.
issues.severity_reason: Using deprecated or unstable versions can lead to unexpected behavior in the CI/CD pipeline.

fixed_code:
# This workflow will build a Java project with Maven, and cache/restore any dependencies to improve the workflow execution time
# For more information see: https://help.github.com/actions/language-and-framework-guides/building-and-testing-java-with-maven

name: Java CI with Maven

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        java: [ "17" ]

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Set up JDK ${{matrix.java}}
        uses: actions/setup-java@v2
        with:
          java-version: ${{matrix.java}}
          distribution: 'adopt'
          cache: maven
      - name: Build with Maven Wrapper
        run: ./mvnw -B package
